name: Asylum Isolation
description:
You were admitted to an asylum but you weren't actualy crazy... you are sane... . Strangely the doctors, the nurses, the guards, everyone was crazy but you. So you try to escape from the asylum.

Using your power you can make a deep hole to isolate the guards so they can't catch you. Be smart because you only have a limited amount of power usage.

Move with W, A, S, D
Click with left mouse to "remove" a floor

FYI - I don't have artistic skill at all
